001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.link;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.button.Button;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
005import org.openqa.selenium.By;
006
007/**
008 * Defines operations for interacting with link components.
009 *
010 * <p>This interface extends {@link Button} and provides additional functionality
011 * for handling link elements, including support for double-click actions.
012 *
013 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
014 */
015public interface Link extends Button {
016
017   /**
018    * Performs a double-click action on a link with the specified text within the given container.
019    *
020    * @param container  The container holding the link.
021    * @param buttonText The text of the link to be double-clicked.
022    */
023   void doubleClick(SmartWebElement container, String buttonText);
024
025   /**
026    * Performs a double-click action on a link within the specified container.
027    *
028    * @param container The container holding the link.
029    */
030   void doubleClick(SmartWebElement container);
031
032   /**
033    * Performs a double-click action on a link identified by its text.
034    *
035    * @param buttonText The text of the link to be double-clicked.
036    */
037   void doubleClick(String buttonText);
038
039   /**
040    * Performs a double-click action on a link located using the specified locator.
041    *
042    * @param buttonLocator The locator identifying the link.
043    */
044   void doubleClick(By buttonLocator);
045}
